doc:
Mark Damon Espinoza https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mark_Damon_Espinoza 0 Mark Damon Espinoza (born in Beaumont, Texas) played "Jesse Vasquez" in the TV series Beverly Hills, 90210 from 1993 to 1995. He also appeared in Married... with Children as Carlos (2 episodes, 1995–1996) as well as a wide variety of guest star appearances in hit shows such as; Private Practice, House, Without a Trace among others. Espinoza played Mexican Police Detective, Alberto Aguilar, on The Young and the Restless investigating the possible role of Victor Newman in a death that occurred in Mexico. After training at the prestigious Circle in The Square Theatre School in New York City he went on to perform in a number of Award-Winning regional theatres such as The Goodman Theatre in Chicago, The Old Globe in San Diego and many others before settling in Los Angeles. His cabaret work includes a variety of New York venues, as well as the International Theatre of Frankfurt (Germany) and The Frankfurt Opera House. He is sometimes credited as Mark D. Espinoza. Mark_Damon_Espinoza ( born in Beaumont , Texas ) played " Jesse_Vasquez " in the_TV_series_Beverly_Hills , 90210 from 1993 to 1995 . He also appeared in Married ... with Children as Carlos_(_2_episodes , 1995 – 1996 ) as_well_as a_wide_variety of guest_star_appearances in hit_shows such_as ; Private_Practice , House , Without a_Trace among others . Espinoza played Mexican_Police_Detective , Alberto_Aguilar , on The_Young and the_Restless investigating the_possible_role of Victor_Newman in a_death that occurred in Mexico . After training at the_prestigious_Circle in The_Square_Theatre_School in New_York_City he went on to_perform in a_number of Award-Winning_regional_theatres such_as The_Goodman_Theatre in Chicago , The_Old_Globe in San_Diego and many_others before settling in Los_Angeles . His_cabaret_work includes a_variety of New_York_venues , as_well_as the_International_Theatre of Frankfurt_(_Germany ) and The_Frankfurt_Opera_House . He is_sometimes_credited as Mark_D._Espinoza .
